source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_SEQ_00<tab>Oboro would teach you what he can in what little time you have.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_SEQ_00<tab>オボロは、急いで新たな印の説明をしたいようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_SEQ_01<tab>Oboro teaches you four new mudra combinations that you can form with your newfound knowledge, but sadly lacks the time to explain, let alone demonstrate the precise nature of their effects and how they will serve you in battle. The task at hand is to see to Tsubame's safety. Return to the dock storehouse where Oboro awaits!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_SEQ_01<tab>オボロから「人の印」の使い方を聞いた。急いで東ラノシアの船着場の平屋に戻り、「オボロ」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_SEQ_02<tab>You return to the docks to see signs that a battle was fought in your absence. Tsubame is missing, but Oboro suspects she is close by. Find her and attend to her wounds if she is injured as Oboro fears.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_SEQ_02<tab>小屋のそばには、争った跡があった。ツバメは船着場の平屋のそばにまだいるはずだ。「ツバメ」を探そう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_SEQ_03<tab>As suspected, you find Tsubame in the clutches of Karasu, who while flogging her to near death, has seemingly seen fit to spare her life. Oboro utterly loses control of his emotions, turning against his foe in a blind, frenzied rage, which seems to please Karasu all the more. Suggesting that this is what he had hoped to see in his rival, the traitor agrees to a battle to the death─a battle in which Oboro and you prove victorious. Oboro is about to claim Karasu's life when your flamboyant foe spins a curious tale that suggests the true traitor of Doma was none other than the trusted teacher of the two shinobi, Master Gekkai. Oboro scoffs, dismissing Karasu's words as pathetic lies, but his expression betrays a heart in turmoil. Karasu cryptically reveals the name of a single location─Candlekeep Quay─before taking to the air and self-immolating in a burst of glory as his rival stands there nonplussed. Speak with Oboro and see how he has handled this unexpected turn of events.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_SEQ_03<tab>ツバメを救助し、カラスを倒すことができた。しかし、オボロの様子がおかしい。レインキャッチャー樹林の「オボロ」に話しかけてみよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_SEQ_04<tab>Understandably rattled by all that has transpired, a stupefied Oboro can only haltingly suggest that the two of you return to the storehouse with Tsubame.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_SEQ_04<tab>オボロの心は晴れないようだ。船着場の平屋に戻った「オボロ」を追い、話しかけてみよう。

source:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_SEQ_05<tab>While Oboro is reluctant to accept Karasu's words as truth, it appears that his rival's words have planted a seed of doubt in his mind. Give your teacher time to work through his crisis of confidence as you hone your ninjutsu skills to new heights.

※The next ninja quest will be available from Oboro upon reaching level 50.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_SEQ_05<tab>カラスの話に、オボロは混乱しているようだ。オボロの心が落ち着くまで、鍛錬に励もう。

※忍者のレベルが50以上になると、オボロから次の忍者クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Oboro at the dock storehouse.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_TODO_00<tab>船着場の平屋の前のオボロと話す

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_TODO_01<tab>Find Tsubame.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_TODO_01<tab>ツバメを探す

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Oboro.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_TODO_02<tab>オボロと話す

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Oboro at the storehouse.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_TODO_03<tab>船着場の平屋のオボロと話す

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_000<tab>You have now learned Jin, the final mudra that I can impart to you. Combine it with the mudra you have already mastered, and you will find four new ninjutsu techniques available to you. Time is short, so listen well.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_000<tab>「人の印」を会得したことで、
お主は、新しく4つの「忍術」を使えるようになった。
急ぎ足となるが、簡単に説明しておこう……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_002<tab>The first is Hyoton, ice release. Form Ten<var 1F /var>Jin or Chi<var 1F /var>Jin. The energies you summon will be channeled into a glacial floe.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_002<tab>まずは「二ツ印」……「氷遁の術」。
「天人」あるいは「地人」の順で「印」を結べ。
周囲のエーテルを己に流して冷やし、凍気と成す。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_003<tab>Second is Huton, wind release. Form Jin<var 1F /var>Chi<var 1F /var>Ten or Chi<var 1F /var>Jin<var 1F /var>Ten. The winds will gather and swirl around you.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_003<tab>続いて「三ツ印」……「風遁の術」。
「人地天」あるいは「地人天」の術で「印」を結べ。
ふたつのエーテルを、天に放ち乱流を呼ぶ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_004<tab>Third is Doton, earth release. Form Ten<var 1F /var>Jin<var 1F /var>Chi or Jin<var 1F /var>Ten<var 1F /var>Chi. The earth itself will move at your will.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_004<tab>そして「三ツ印」……「土遁の術」。
「天人地」あるいは「人天地」の順で「印」を結べ。
ふたつのエーテルを、地に流して土流を生む。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_005<tab>Finally, there is Suiton, release of water. Form Ten<var 1F /var>Chi<var 1F /var>Jin, or Chi<var 1F /var>Ten<var 1F /var>Jin. Water will course and flow through you.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_005<tab>最後に「三ツ印」……「水遁の術」。
「天地人」あるいは「地天人」の順で「印」を結べ。
ふたつのエーテルを、己に満たし水流と成す。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_006<tab>As for how each technique will avail you, I trust you will learn on the field of battle.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_006<tab>いずれも異なる特性を持つ「忍術」だが、
事細かに説明している時間はない……。
これまでの経験を活かし、使うことで体得するのだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_008<tab>Now, let us hurry! Tsubame is in danger!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_008<tab>さぁ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
急いで船着場の平屋に戻るぞ、ツバメが危ない！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_BYAKUBU_000_015<tab>Ahhh... <cough> Ahhhhhhhhh...!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_BYAKUBU_000_015<tab>あ……ああ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_001<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_007<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_007<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_010<tab>Shuriken... A battle was fought here. I hear no sounds from within. Tsubame must be here, somewhere!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_010<tab>この手裏剣は、争った跡か……。
……どうやら、平屋の中にはツバメはいないようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_011<tab>Byakubu has lost his words from the shock. He can tell us nothing. Come, we must find Tsubame, and quickly!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_011<tab>ビャクブは、混乱していて話にならぬ。
ツバメはまだ近くにいるはずだ……探すぞ！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_020<tab>Tsu-Tsubame!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_020<tab>大丈夫か、ツバメ！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_TSUBAME_000_021<tab>It is...but a flesh...wound... <cough> O-Oboro... Look out!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_TSUBAME_000_021<tab>……わ……たしは、大丈夫……です。
オボロ様……気を、つけ、て……ゴホッ！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_022<tab>(-???-)Come now, little swallow. Say that it hurts...that you were scared... Tell the dim one how I took great pains to see that you were fully awake for every moment of agony and terror!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_022<tab>(-？？？？-)ウププ……強がっちゃってェ、怖かっただろう……？
痛みと恐怖に支配されても、決して意識を手放せぬよう、
ギリギリの線で傷めつけたんだァ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_023<tab>Karasu! This time, you go too far!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_023<tab>カラス、貴様っ！！！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_024<tab>Yes, <var 1A 02 /var>yes<var 1A 01 /var>! Those are the eyes I wanted to see! Let the anger, the hatred burn away any spot of doubt that remains in your heart!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_024<tab>ウププ……それそれぇ、その眼だヨォ～。
やはりキミの刃は、怒りに燃えている時が最も煌めく……！
……合格だよ、オボロく～ん。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_025<tab>The fire in your eyes─resolve born from the all-consuming flames of rage and passion! The look in your eyes that day, when you looked on as your friends, your countrymen were massacred, powerless to end the slaughter!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_025<tab>ドマの民、里の民が目の前で大量に殺された、
「あの時」と同じ煌きだァ……。
オオオ、最ッ高に沸き立つヨォ……！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_026<tab>Gaaahhh!!! Be silent, be silent, BE SILENT, <var 1A 02 /var>BE SILENT<var 1A 01 /var>!!!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_026<tab>黙れ、黙れ、黙れ、黙れ……！
癇に障る声で、べらべらとよく喋る！！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_100_026<tab>Tsubame, stand back. I shall slice this crow's tongue, then tear him limb from limb with my bare hands!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_100_026<tab>ツバメ、さがれ……！
カラスはここで、必ず仕留める！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_027<tab>Ahahaha! Such pure, unadulterated malice! Finally, you are an adversary worthy of my blade!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_027<tab>ンフフフフフフフフ！！
いいね、いいねいいねいいねいいねェ、沸き立つヨォ！
隠す気ゼロの殺意……それでこそ、ボクが本気を出す価値がある！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_028<tab>The true shinobi─ever calm, dutiful to his master... Presence of mind... Yes, the first few times we met, you fought with all the passion of a mokujin. Today you stand before me as a man!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_028<tab>忍びらしく、冷静に、忠実に……。
そんな「心」は、殺し合いの場では何の力も持たない！
目の前の敵を強く呪った奴だけが、先の物語に進めるんだ！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_029<tab>You wanted a battle, and today you shall have one─no retreat, no reprieve. The defeated shall die like a dog, and the victor? The victor's tale will continue for another day...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_029<tab>……さぁ、勝負をしよう。
ボクの刃が勝つか、キミたちの刃が勝つか……。
敗者には死が、勝者には続きが待ってるヨォ……？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_100<tab>...Karasu Redbeak. In the name of our elders, I take your life as divine retribution for your crimes. Your bloodstained beak will feast on the innocent no more.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_100<tab>ここまでだ、カラス……。
里からの命に従い、お前の命を貰う。
それが、里を裏切った代償だ……！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_101<tab>...Ahaha! Ahahahaha! Does he <var 1A 02 /var>truly<var 1A 01 /var> believe those words!? Ahaha! Aheahehaheaheaeha!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_101<tab>…………クク……アハハ……アハハハハハァ！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_102<tab>Oh, yes, this beak is stained with blood...this I do not deny. But I am not the leader of this murderous flock.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_102<tab>里を裏切った……代償だァ？
まぁったく、優等生仮面が、偉そうによく言うよネェ！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_103<tab>I tire of your riddles, Redbeak! Give me one reason why I should not separate your head from your shoulders!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_103<tab>……何が言いたい。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_104<tab>Oh, dear! What a pickle I find myself in! Now how can I put this in terms even the dim one can understand? I am not the traitor you seek. He is not I, and <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> am not <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_104<tab>鈍いなァ、教えてやってんじゃナイ。
本当の「裏切り者」は、ボクじゃないってさァ……？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_105<tab>You believe I was the only one who fled Doma. Are you <var 1A 02 /var>sure<var 1A 01 /var>? Absolutely <var 1A 02 /var>certain<var 1A 01 /var>? Did you see the bodies─the <var 1A 02 /var>faces<var 1A 01 /var>─of all your brothers who fell that day?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_105<tab>ウププ……。
オボロくんはさァ、ドマが急襲されたあの日にィ、
仲間の死体の顔……全部、確認したァ？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_106<tab>Think, think, <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var>! I know it is not a strength of yours, but surely you remember! One body, maimed so badly that only the possessions could identify the man. And the <var 1A 02 /var>face<var 1A 01 /var>─could it even be called a face? Naught but shattered bone and shredded flesh remained where once had been the proud features of...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_106<tab>なァなァなァ、思いだせよォ、ホラ早くゥ！
ひとりだけ、判別不能な死体があったはずだ！
服装だけで身元を判断された、ボクらの恩人がさァ……！？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_107<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>LIE<var 1A 01 /var>!!! One more word... One more twisted, deceitful <var 1A 02 /var>word<var 1A 01 /var>, Redbeak, and I will... I will...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_107<tab>なっ……そんなわけがあるか！
あの方が、あの方がそんな……！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_108<tab>Ahahaha! Oh, Oboro─poor, sweet, <var 1A 02 /var>stupid<var 1A 01 /var> Oboro. How long will you continue to deceive yourself?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_108<tab>アハハハ……そう、ボクらの師匠「ゲッカイ」だ！
アイツは死んでない、死んだふりをして逃げた！
本当の裏切り者は、アイツだよ！！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_109<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>lie<var 1A 01 /var>, Redbeak, as you always have. Did betraying our homeland not sate your thirst for treachery? That now you must drag our master's name through the mud!? Answer me this, then: if you were not the traitor, then why did you flee the village that day?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_109<tab>命乞いのデタラメだ！
師匠が里を裏切るわけがない！
……それに、ならばなぜ、お前まで里を逃げ出した！！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_110<tab>...How often have I asked myself the same! Oh, how simpler things would have been had I been as naive as you! But the circumstances of Master Gekkai's death did not sit well with me. I left the village looking for answers, and found something far more interesting─our master himself, alive and well.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_110<tab>忘れもしないよ、襲撃されたあの日のことォ……。
死んだはずの師匠が逃げているところを、偶然見つけてさァ。
理由を聞こうと思って、追いかけたんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_111<tab>In an instant, his hand was at my mouth and his blade at my neck. A simple choice he gave me: follow him and live, refuse and die.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_111<tab>そしたら、逆に捕まっちゃってさァ……。
味方につくなら命は助ける、って言われたわけェ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_112<tab>I would like to say I weighed my decision heavily, but the answer really was quite clear. Death is so <var 1A 02 /var>final<var 1A 01 /var>, after all, while life─even a life spent as an imperial spy─holds so many <var 1A 02 /var>opportunities<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_112<tab>ま、師匠を追ったのも好奇心だったし、
新たな土地に行くのも面白いかなァと思って、従ったのさァ。
……結局、帝国軍ごっこは想像より退屈だったけどネェ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_113<tab>What's the matter, dim one? Do you still find my tale hard to swallow? Oh, believe as you will─redemption means little to a dead man.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_113<tab>プププ、まだ信じられてないのかなァ？
戦いの前の威勢が、まるでなくなっちゃったネェ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_114<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> going to kill me, yes? That <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> your mission, after all. Sworn in the sight of the elders, tradition and custom, and so on and so forth?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_114<tab>衝撃に浸る時間はないはずだヨォ？
ボクが死ねば「任務」は終わってしまう。
そうしたらもう、エオルゼアでの用はないはずだからネェ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_115<tab>...Candlekeep Quay. When the time is right, he will come, and all will be revealed. ...I just thought I'd tell the one who's shown <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> capable of listening to reason.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_115<tab>そうそう、これは<var 08 E905 ((ヒヨコちゃん)) ((ヒヨコ君)) /var>の方に言うんだけどォ。
「キャンドルキープ埠頭」付近の動きに注意しときなァ。
……奴は必ず現れる、時が満ちたらネェ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_116<tab>The lights grow dim! The <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((stars turn black)) ((sun turns black)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((sun turns black)) ((stars turn black)) /var>)) /var> in the sky! Our hero fought─fought bravely, even─but his chapter in this grand mummery has come to a close... Summoning his last breaths, our hero...speaks...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_116<tab>それじゃ、サヨナラだ。
いつの世も、勝者は先の物語に進み……敗者は死んで幕切れ、だァ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_100_116<tab>Just promise me this, Oboro. Whatever your mission, should you fail, just don't go off <var 1A 02 /var>dying<var 1A 01 /var>. I know how fond you are of tradition, but this is a new era, and we are not our ancestors. Besides, such an end just wouldn't become a solemn youth like yourself.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_100_116<tab>……言っとくけどォ、任務失敗したから死ぬんじゃないヨォ。
そんな、ダッサい忍びみたいな信念は、ないんだからネェ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_117<tab>So <var 1A 02 /var>live<var 1A 01 /var>, and leave the dying to those who can do it in style. Yes, I may not have been the hero I thought I was, nor the villain you would have me be, but from beginning to end, I was <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>, and there is nothing I would rather be. Farewell, cruel world, and good bloody riddance!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_KARASU_000_117<tab>英雄にも、裏切り者にもなれない素敵なボクはさァ……
ただ、愛に満ちた自由の世界に逝くんだ。
筋書きどおりに、ネェ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_118<tab>Wait... Karasu!!!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_118<tab>待て、カラス！！！！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_119<tab>What can this all mean...?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_119<tab>本当に……師匠、が…………？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_150<tab>Karasu is dead, our mission complete. Yet you will forgive me if I am unsure how to feel about this turn of events...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_150<tab>我らの目的、カラスの誅殺は完了した…………。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_151<tab>In any event, there is nothing more to be done here. Tsubame is wounded. Let us bring her home.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_151<tab>……任務達成だ。
船着場の平屋に戻ろう……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_TSUBAME_000_160<tab>Thank you for coming to my rescue, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I owe you and Oboro my life. Worry not for me─with rest, I will be fine...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_TSUBAME_000_160<tab>少し落ち着きました。
だ、大丈夫です、これくらい……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_BYAKUBU_000_165<tab>When last we met I was not myself. Pray forgive me. Master Oboro awaits inside.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_BYAKUBU_000_165<tab>先ほどは、すまなかった……。
オボロ様がお待ちだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_200<tab>The mission that brought me to Eorzea is complete. Once Tsubame's wounds heal, we have no reason to sojourn further in these lands.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_200<tab>長から受けた命は達成した。
ツバメの怪我が治ったら、我々は里に戻る……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_201<tab>And yet, if Karasu spoke true... No... It simply cannot be...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_201<tab>しかし……師匠が、もし本当に……だったら……。
…………私は。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_202<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_OBORO_000_202<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_TODO001<tab>Defeat Karasu and his minions!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_TODO001<tab>カラスたちを倒せ！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_OBORO_BATTLETALK_01<tab>This trembling... My heart will know no peace until you are gone from this world!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_OBORO_BATTLETALK_01<tab>この心の震えは、貴様を仕留めなければ止まらぬようだ……！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_KARASU_BATTLETALK_01<tab>You look <var 1A 02 /var>angry<var 1A 01 /var>, dear Oboro. Is it because I clipped your pretty swallow's wing?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_KARASU_BATTLETALK_01<tab>ウププ、随分とノリノリだネェ～。
ツバメちゃんを、おちょくったからかなァ～？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_KARASU_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Come, my pets─it is feeding time!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_KARASU_BATTLETALK_02<tab>おいでェ、蝙蝠ちゃんたち……ご馳走だヨォ……？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_OBORO_BATTLETALK_02<tab>A mudra of summoning!? ...This bodes ill. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, that magicked circle must be destroyed!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_OBORO_BATTLETALK_02<tab>あれは「口寄せの陣」か、まずいな……
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、陣の印を破壊してくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_KARASU_BATTLETALK_03<tab>Gah! Your mind is nothing but <var 1A 02 /var>noise<var 1A 01 /var>, Oboro! Purge your heart of all anger, all hatred, all compassion, all regret! Only in emptiness will you find the strength to defeat me!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_KARASU_BATTLETALK_03<tab>ネェ、これがボクらの最後の戦いだ……。
もっと本気で、死ぬ気で、全力で殺しにきなァ……！！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_OBORO_BATTLETALK_03<tab>Again!? I don't want to see what's coming... Destroy that circle quickly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_OBORO_BATTLETALK_03<tab>また「口寄せの陣」を……ッ！
陣の印を頼む、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_OBORO_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>It cannot end... Not like this!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN451_00233_QIB_001_OBORO_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>こんな、ところで……！
